summary:
[b][i][color=lime][size=50]Skyrim Ultra Settings[/color][/b][/i][/size]
By IceTeaGaming

This mod is for a better Graphic,Performance and Gameplay Experin Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[i][color=lime][size=150]Skyrim Ultra Settings[/color][/i][/size]
By IceTeaGaming

[i][color=orange][size=4]Hey guys, I want to show you my first [i][color=orange][size=4]Skyrim-Graphics/Settings-[/size][/color][/i]Mod![/size][/color][/i]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53278-1-1406544351.jpg[/img]

[u][color=Lawngreen][size=6]Explanation[/size][/color][/u]
With this Mod you get better Graphics, better Performance and a better Gaming Experience.
The Mod is fully configurable in order to get a better Result for your Skyrim.


[u][color=Lawngreen][size=6]Installation[/size][/color][/u]

Back up your old Settings, if something goes wrong!
--------------------
[i][color=orange][size=2]1. Step:[/size][/color][/i] Download the Mod
[i][color=orange][size=2]2. Step:[/size][/color][/i] Unpack the Zip or Rar file on your Desktop
[i][color=orange][size=2]3. Step:[/size][/color][/i] Open the 2 Files [ Skyrim.ini, SkyrimPrefs.ini ] and configure it however you want
[i][color=orange][size=2]4. Step:[/size][/color][/i] Put the two Files into the path [Users - Documents - My Games - Skyrim]
[i][color=orange][size=2]5. Step:[/size][/color][/i] Start Skyrim - Your Settings are read and you can launch Skyrim

[u][color=Lawngreen][size=6]Uninstallation[/size][/color][/u]
[i][color=orange][size=2]1. Step:[/size][/color][/i] Delete the Skyrim.ini and the SkyrimPrefs.iniÂ  [Users - Documents - My Games - Skyrim]
[i][color=orange][size=2]2. Step:[/size][/color][/i] Put the Backup Files [ Skyrim.ini, SkyrimPrefs.ini ] into [Users - Documents - My Games - Skyrim]


[u][color=Lawngreen][size=6]System Requirements[/size][/color][/u]
The Mod works with Medium - Good PCs. The used Power depends on the selected Settings

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53278-5-1406544352.jpg[/img]

[u][color=Lawngreen][size=6] Modlist[/size][/color][/u]
[i][color=orange][size=2]1. Step:[/size][/color][/i] Install your Enb
[i][color=orange][size=2]2. Step:[/size][/color][/i] Install your Mods
[i][color=orange][size=2]3. Step:[/size][/color][/i] Install my Settings

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53278-3-1406544352.jpg[/img]


[u][color=Lawngreen][size=6]Support[/size][/color][/u]
If you have any Questions, you can contact me or post your Opinion about the Mod in the Forum.

I hope you enjoy my Mod :D
IceTeaGaming
